name: Phytophthora Root Rot
symptoms: ['Yellowing leaves', 'wilting', 'stunted growth', 'root discoloration (dark brown/black)', 'eventual tree death', 'canopy thinning']

name: Macadamia Nut Borer
symptoms: ['Holes in nuts', 'frass (insect excrement) inside nuts', 'premature nut drop', 'damaged kernels', 'dimple marks on shell']

name: Green Vegetable Bug
symptoms: ['Stunted nuts', 'brown spots on kernels', 'discolored pit on kernel', 'premature nut drop', 'reduced kernel quality', 'hidden damage']

name: Macadamia Felt Scale
symptoms: ['White, felt-like masses on twigs and branches', 'yellowing leaves', 'stunted growth', 'sooty mold growth']

name: Anthracnose
symptoms: ['Dark, sunken lesions on leaves, flowers, and fruit', 'premature fruit drop', 'twig dieback', 'pinkish spore masses in wet weather']

name: Macadamia Husk Spot
symptoms: ['Pale yellow flecks with diffuse halo', 'tan-coloured spots', 'premature nut drop', 'woody lesions on husk']

name: Macadamia Husk Rot (Soft Rot)
symptoms: ['Soft and spongy black lesions', 'greasy decay', 'bad odour', 'triggered by insect wounds']

name: Botryosphaeria Branch Dieback
symptoms: ['Cankers on branches', 'branch dieback', 'complete tree death', 'gum exudation']

name: Pink Disease
symptoms: ['Pinkish-white mycelial growth on bark', 'cankers', 'branch dieback', 'defoliation']

name: Sooty Mold
symptoms: ['Black, powdery coating on leaves, stems, and fruit', 'associated with honeydew from pests']

name: Algal Spot
symptoms: ['Greenish-orange, velvety spots on leaves and stems', 'sometimes raised']

name: Flower Thrips
symptoms: ['Distorted flowers', 'brown streaks on petals', 'reduced fruit set', 'scarring on young nuts']

name: Macadamia Leaf Miner
symptoms: ['Serpentine mines on leaves', 'distorted leaves', 'premature leaf drop']

name: Macadamia Root Knot Nematode
symptoms: ['Galls or swellings on roots', 'stunted growth', 'yellowing leaves', 'reduced yield']

name: Macadamia False Codling Moth
symptoms: ['Holes in nuts', 'frass inside nuts', 'premature nut drop', 'damaged kernels']

name: Macadamia Lace Bug
symptoms: ['Stippling (small white spots) on upper leaves', 'yellowing', 'sooty mold on underside']

name: Macadamia Mealybug
symptoms: ['White, cottony masses', 'stunted growth', 'sooty mold growth']

name: Macadamia Aphids
symptoms: ['Curled or distorted new leaves', 'stunted growth', 'sticky honeydew', 'sooty mold growth']

name: Macadamia Mites
symptoms: ['Stippling on leaves', 'bronzing', 'fine webbing on underside of leaves', 'defoliation']

name: Boron Deficiency
symptoms: ['Stunted growth', 'distorted new leaves', 'cracked stems', 'poor nut set', 'hollow nuts']

name: Iron Deficiency
symptoms: ['Interveinal chlorosis (yellowing between veins) on young leaves', 'veins remain green']

name: Late Blight
symptoms: ['Water-soaked spots on leaves', 'White fungal growth on undersides', 'Rapid browning and wilting of foliage', 'Fruit rot']

name: Early Blight
symptoms: ['Dark brown spots with concentric rings (target board effect)', 'Yellowing of lower leaves', 'Stem lesions', 'Fruit rot']

name: Downy Mildew
symptoms: ['Yellow or pale green blotches on upper leaf surface', 'Grey or purple fuzzy growth on leaf underside', 'Leaf drop']

name: Powdery Mildew
symptoms: ['White powdery fungal growth on leaves and flowers', 'Leaf distortion or curling', 'Stunted growth']

name: Bacterial Spot
symptoms: ['Small irregular dark spots', 'Yellow halos around spots', 'Shot-hole effect on leaves', 'Scab-like spots on fruit']

name: Leaf Spot
symptoms: ['Circular dark brown spots', 'Yellow halos', 'Leaf scorching', 'Premature leaf drop']

name: Rust
symptoms: ['Orange or red pustules on leaf undersides', 'Yellowing leaves', 'Defoliation']

name: Wilt (Quick Decline)
symptoms: ['Rapid browning of canopy', 'Gum exudation on trunk', 'Tree death within weeks']

name: Cutworms
symptoms: ['Seedlings cut at base', 'Wilting of young plants', 'Larvae found in soil']

name: Whiteflies
symptoms: ['Small white flies under leaves', 'Yellowing leaves', 'Honeydew', 'Sooty mold']
